configuration.description:
You must import the Lightweight Third Party Authentication(LTPA) key from your Content Engine web application server to the IBM Content Navigator web application server.
Important: You must export the LTPA key file from the Content Engine server and save it on this machine before you run this task.
configuration.displayName: Import Your Content Engine LTPA Keys

property.name: LTPAKeyPath
property.description:
Enter the fully qualified path of the LTPA key file to import to the IBM Content Navigator web application server.
Remember: You must export the LTPA key file from the Content Engine server and save it on this machine before you run this task.

property.name: LTPAKeyPassword
property.description: Enter the LTPA key password. You can get this password from your Content Engine administrator.

property.name: ImportScript
property.description: Enter the fully qualified path of the import script, importLTPAKey.tcl. The default path is importLTPAKey.tcl.

property.name: tempDir
property.description:
Enter the fully qualified path of a temporary directory that the configuration and deployment tool can use when running this task.
You must have read and write access for the directory.
The default directory is: C:\Program Files (x86)\IBM\ECMClient\configure\tmp.
